verbose_text: In this study, we demonstrated that the blocking alpha v -integrin in neutrophils effectively diminished the effects of rmMFG-E8 on IL-8-mediated HL-60 cell migration through the activation of MAP kinases and the modulation of GRK2 / CXCR2 expression, indicating the involvement of alpha v -integrin in mediating MFG-E8 activity.
